original_title: 8年の刑期を終えた巨漢レ×プ魔に侵入された華奢スレンダーＯＬがトラウマ種付けプレスで犯され続けた３日間
overview: [The second installment of the absurd traumatic work of being raped by the same man after 8 years!] Hana, who was raped when she was a student and became afraid of men, grew up with trauma. He was supposed to have escaped to the countryside with his family and regained peace, but the tragedy began again when he was found by the released rapist. She was crushed by a man who came to vent her semen and sexual desire that she had accumulated without being able to hold a woman for 8 years.
title: After An 8-Year Prison Sentence, A Horrible Crazed Man Takes A Luxurious Slender Office Lady For 3 Whole Days Of Intense Fucking. Hana Shirato
